edu.usc.pgroup.goffish.gofs.namenode

Class LocalNameNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.usc.pgroup.goffish.gofs.namenode.LocalNameNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INameNode, Serializable

    public class LocalNameNode
extends Object
implements INameNode, Serializable
    This class is an in-memory instance of INameNode. It is used as the basis for many other INameNode implementations. This class is fully thread safe.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        outputStream - the stream to write the name node to
        Throws:

      • getPartitions

        public List<Long> getPartitions(String graphId)
        Description copied from interface: INameNode
        Retrieves a list of all the partitions for a graph with the given id. This information is a copy, and not a live view of the set of partitions.
        Specified by:
        getPartitions in interface INameNode
        Parameters:
        graphId - the graph to retrieve partition ids for
        Returns:
        a list of all the partitions for a graph with the given id, or null if the graph is unknown

      • getMatchingPartitions

        public List<Long> getMatchingPartitions(String graphId,
                               URI locationToMatch)
        Description copied from interface: INameNode
        Returns all the URIs that match the given graph and location. Matching is performed for every piece of the input location URI that is not null. I.e., if the host is non-null, the host must match, if the path is non-null, the path must match, etc... Matching is case-sensitive. The following URI pieces are matched: scheme, userinfo, host, port, path, query, fragment. For the path component of the URI, partial matching is allowed. I.e. a path of '/dir1' will match both '/dir1' and '/dir1/dir2'.
        Specified by:
        getMatchingPartitions in interface INameNode
        Parameters:
        graphId - the graph to retrieve partition ids for
        locationToMatch - a URI which will match against every non-null piece of this URI. Path matching allows for partial matching. The URI must be non-opaque.
        Returns:
        a map of the graphs and partitions matching the query

      • getPartitionMapping

        public URI getPartitionMapping(String graphId,
                      long partitionId)
        Description copied from interface: INameNode
        Retrieves a URI representing the specified partition. By convention, this generally represents the host, path, and UUID of the partition slice. The host and path are specified by the URI, and the UUID is attached as a string as the URI fragment. The UUID can thus be reconstructed through UUID.fromString(uri.getFragment()).
        Specified by:
        getPartitionMapping in interface INameNode
        Parameters:
        graphId - the graph id of the graph that contains the given partition
        partitionId - the partition id being queried for
        Returns:
        a URI representing the location of the partition

      • putPartitionMapping

        public void putPartitionMapping(String graphId,
                       long partitionId,
                       URI uri)
        Description copied from interface: INameNode
        Informs the name node of the existence of a mapping from partition id to partition location, which will be returned by any subsequent queries. The location URI may not be opaque.
        Specified by:
        putPartitionMapping in interface INameNode
        Parameters:
        graphId - the graph id of the graph that contains the given partition
        partitionId - the partition id being queried for
        uri - the location of the given partition. See INameNode.getPartitionMapping(String, long) for a discussion of conventional formats.

      • removePartitionMapping

        public void removePartitionMapping(String graphId,
                          long partitionId)
        Description copied from interface: INameNode
        Removes a mapping for the given partition from this name node.
        Specified by:
        removePartitionMapping in interface INameNode
        Parameters:
        graphId - the graph id of the graph that contains the given partition
        partitionId - the partition id being queried for

      • hasPartitionMapping

        public boolean hasPartitionMapping(String graphId,
                          long partitionId)
        Description copied from interface: INameNode
        Returns whether this name node knows of a mapping for the given partition in the given graph.
        Specified by:
        hasPartitionMapping in interface INameNode
        Parameters:
        graphId - the graph id of the graph that contains the given partition
        partitionId - the partition id being queried for
        Returns:
        True if this name node knows of such a mapping, false otherwise
